About Me



Charlie Ward is an aspiring developer and a B.S. Business Administration student at Chapman University in Orange, CA. He has programmed video games and websites/web applications, and completed coursework including Financial Accounting, Project Management, and Business Statistics and Analytics.

Currently, Charlie is looking for internship opportunities to start his developer career while he completes his time at Chapman. He is also working on multiple personal projects to further his experience, including a 2D platformer and a note-taking application.
